mapper.select:
SELECT TBL.*, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY_INFO WHERE ISUSE = 'Y' AND CODE = TBL.CATEGORY_CD) CATEGORY_NM, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_LEARNING_FORM_INFO WHERE ISUSE = 'Y' AND CODE = TBL.LEARNING_CD) LEARNING_NM, (SELECT COUNT(RSC_ID) FROM TB_CA_BOOK WHERE SEQ = TBL.SEQ AND RSC_ID NOT IN (TBL.RSC_ID)) RELCNT FROM ( SELECT T2.SEQ, T2.RSC_ID, T2.BOOK_NM, T2.BOOK_AUTHOR, T2.BOOK_PUBLISHERS, CASE T2.COVER_TYPE WHEN 'A' THEN '주문가능' WHEN 'S' THEN '품절' WHEN 'O' THEN '절판' WHEN 'N' THEN '신규' WHEN 'E' THEN '이벤트도서' ELSE '' END AS COVER_TYPE, T2.BOOK_STOCK, T2.CATEGORY_CD, T2.LEARNING_CD, T2.REG_DT, T2.BOOK_PAGE, T2.BOOK_FORMAT FROM (SELECT SEQ, MIN(RSC_ID) RSC_ID FROM TB_CA_BOOK GROUP BY SEQ) T1 INNER JOIN TB_CA_BOOK T2 ON T1.RSC_ID = T2.RSC_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.CATEGORY_CD = #{SEARCHKIND}
AND INSTR(T2.BOOK_AUTHOR, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0
AND INSTR(T2.RSC_ID, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0
AND INSTR(T2.BOOK_NM, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0
AND T2.COVER_TYPE = 'A'
AND T2.COVER_TYPE = 'S'
AND T2.COVER_TYPE = 'O'
AND T2.COVER_TYPE = 'N'
AND T2.COVER_TYPE = 'E'
AND ( INSTR(T2.BOOK_AUTHOR, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0 OR INSTR(T2.RSC_ID, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0 OR INSTR(T2.BOOK_NM, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0 )
ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(T2.REG_DT,'%Y%m%d') DESC, T2.CATEGORY_CD ) TBL LIMIT #{startNo}, #{endNo}

SELECT COUNT(T1.SEQ) FROM (SELECT SEQ, MAX(RSC_ID) RSC_ID FROM TB_CA_BOOK GROUP BY SEQ) T1 INNER JOIN TB_CA_BOOK T2 ON T1.RSC_ID = T2.RSC_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.CATEGORY_CD = #{SEARCHKIND}
AND INSTR(T2.BOOK_AUTHOR, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0
AND INSTR(T2.RSC_ID, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0
AND INSTR(T2.BOOK_NM, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0
AND COVER_TYPE = 'A'
AND COVER_TYPE = 'S'
AND COVER_TYPE = 'O'
AND COVER_TYPE = 'N'
AND COVER_TYPE = 'E'
AND ( INSTR(T2.BOOK_AUTHOR, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0 OR INSTR(T2.RSC_ID, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0 OR INSTR(T2.BOOK_NM, #{SEARCHTEXT}) > 0 )

SELECT LEC_DIV, CODE, NAME FROM TB_LEARNING_FORM_INFO WHERE 1 = 1
AND LEC_DIV = 'LEC_A'
AND LEC_DIV = 'LEC_B'
AND LEC_DIV = 'LEC_D'
AND LEC_DIV = 'LEC_C'
AND LEC_DIV = 'LEC_Y'
AND LEC_DIV = 'LEC_A'
AND ISUSE = 'Y' ORDER BY CODE ASC

SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT CC.USER_ID, AA.SUBJECT_NM, CC.USER_NM, AA.SUBJECT_CD, CC.PAYMENT, CC.OFF_PAYMENT
, (SELECT COUNT(SUBJECT_SJT_CD) FROM TB_CA_BOOK WHERE RSC_ID = #{RSC_ID} AND SUBJECT_SJT_CD LIKE '%' || AA.SUBJECT_CD||'#'||CC.USER_ID || '%') SCNT
, (SELECT COUNT(SUBJECT_SJT_CD) FROM TB_OFF_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = #{LECCODE} AND BB.USER_ID = (SELECT SUBJECT_TEACHER FROM TB_OFF_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = #{LECCODE}) AND SUBJECT_SJT_CD = AA.SUBJECT_CD) SCNT
, (SELECT COUNT(SUBJECT_SJT_CD) FROM TB_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = #{LECCODE} AND BB.USER_ID = (SELECT SUBJECT_TEACHER FROM TB_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = #{LECCODE}) AND SUBJECT_SJT_CD = AA.SUBJECT_CD) SCNT
FROM TB_SUBJECT_INFO AA INNER JOIN TB_MA_MEMBER_SUBJECT BB ON AA.SUBJECT_CD = BB.SUBJECT_CD INNER JOIN TB_MA_MEMBER CC ON BB.USER_ID = CC.USER_ID WHERE AA.ISUSE = 'Y' AND CC.ISUSE = 'Y' AND CC.USER_NM IS NOT NULL
AND (CC.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#{TEACHER_NM}||'%' OR AA.SUBJECT_NM LIKE '%'||#{TEACHER_NM}||'%')
) TBL ORDER BY
TBL.SCNT DESC,
TBL.USER_NM, TBL.SUBJECT_NM ASC
SELECT REPLACE('L' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') || TO_CHAR(SEQ_TB_CA_BOOK_ID.NEXTVAL,'00000'),' ','') AS RSC_ID FROM DUAL

SELECT ((SELECT NVL(SUM(CNT),0) FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105','DLV110','DLV120','DLV125','DLV130') AND MGNTNO = AA.RSC_ID) -(SELECT NVL(SUM(CNT),0) FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE MGNTNO = AA.RSC_ID AND PRICE < 0)) AS CNT, SEQ, RSC_ID, SUBJECT_SJT_CD, CATEGORY_CD, LEARNING_CD, BOOK_NM, BOOK_INFO, BOOK_MEMO, BOOK_KEYWORD, ISSUE_DATE, DECODE(AA.COVER_TYPE,'A','주문가능','S','품절','O','절판','N','신규','E','이벤트','') COVER_TYPE, BOOK_CONTENTS, PRICE, DISCOUNT, DISCOUNT_PRICE, POINT, BOOK_PUBLISHERS, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_MAIN, ATTACH_FILE, ATTACH_IMG_L, ATTACH_IMG_M, ATTACH_IMG_S, ATTACH_DETAIL_INFO, BOOK_STOCK, REG_DT, UPD_DT, UPD_ID, BOOK_PAGE, BOOK_FORMAT, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY_INFO WHERE ISUSE = 'Y' AND CODE = AA.CATEGORY_CD) CATEGORY_NM, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_LEARNING_FORM_INFO WHERE ISUSE = 'Y' AND CODE = AA.LEARNING_CD) LEARNING_NM FROM TB_CA_BOOK AA WHERE SEQ = #{SEQ} ORDER BY AA.SEQ DESC, AA.RSC_ID ASC
SELECT AA.*, NVL(AA.MAIN_VIEW,'N') AS MAIN_VIEW, NVL(AA.NEW_BOOK,'N') AS NEW_BOOK FROM TB_CA_BOOK AA WHERE AA.RSC_ID = #{RSC_ID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PLUS_CA_BOOK WHERE RSC_ID = #{RSC_ID}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TBL.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT AA.* FROM ( SELECT A.ORDERNO, B.USER_ID AS ORDERS_USERID , B.USER_NM AS ORDERS_USERNAME , C.PAYCODE, FN_GET_CODE_NM('PAYMENT_CODE', C.PAYCODE) PAY_NM , C.REG_DT AS ORDERS_REGDATE , D.BOOK_NM, A.PRICE, A.STATUSCODE , FN_GET_CODE_NM('ORDER_STATUSCODE', A.STATUSCODE) STATUS_NM FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO A INNER JOIN (SELECT ORDERNO, MGNTNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO GROUP BY ORDERNO, MGNTNO HAVING COUNT(*) = 1) E ON A.ORDERNO = E.ORDERNO AND A.MGNTNO = E.MGNTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ORDERS B ON A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_APPROVALS C ON A.ORDERNO = C.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CA_BOOK D ON A.MGNTNO = D.RSC_ID WHERE A.MGNTNO = #{RSC_ID} AND A.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105','DLV110','DLV120','DLV125','DLV130') ) AA WHERE AA.ORDERNO NOT IN (SELECT ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE PRICE < 0 AND MGNTNO = #{RSC_ID}) ORDER BY AA.ORDERS_REGDATE DESC ) TBL WHERE rownum <= #{endNo} ) WHERE rnum > #{startNo}

SELECT COUNT(AA.ORDERNO) FROM ( SELECT A.ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO A INNER JOIN (SELECT ORDERNO, MGNTNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO GROUP BY ORDERNO, MGNTNO HAVING COUNT(*) = 1) E ON A.ORDERNO = E.ORDERNO AND A.MGNTNO = E.MGNTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ORDERS B ON A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_APPROVALS C ON A.ORDERNO = C.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CA_BOOK D ON A.MGNTNO = D.RSC_ID WHERE A.MGNTNO = #{RSC_ID} AND A.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105','DLV110','DLV120','DLV125','DLV130') ) AA WHERE AA.ORDERNO NOT IN (SELECT ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE PRICE < 0 AND MGNTNO = #{RSC_ID})

SELECT AA.* FROM ( SELECT A.ORDERNO, B.USER_ID AS ORDERS_USERID , B.USER_NM AS ORDERS_USERNAME , C.PAYCODE, FN_GET_CODE_NM('PAYMENT_CODE', C.PAYCODE) PAY_NM , TO_CHAR(C.REG_DT , 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS ORDERS_REGDATE , D.BOOK_NM, TO_CHAR(A.PRICE) AS PRICE, A.STATUSCODE , FN_GET_CODE_NM('ORDER_STATUSCODE', A.STATUSCODE) STATUS_NM FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO A INNER JOIN (SELECT ORDERNO, MGNTNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO GROUP BY ORDERNO, MGNTNO HAVING COUNT(*) = 1) E ON A.ORDERNO = E.ORDERNO AND A.MGNTNO = E.MGNTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ORDERS B ON A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_APPROVALS C ON A.ORDERNO = C.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CA_BOOK D ON A.MGNTNO = D.RSC_ID WHERE A.MGNTNO = #{RSC_ID} AND A.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105','DLV110','DLV120','DLV125','DLV130') ) AA WHERE AA.ORDERNO NOT IN (SELECT ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE PRICE < 0) ORDER BY AA.ORDERS_REGDATE DESC
